title: I liked old Quinn ult more than the new one.
body:
I don't like that the new ult is basically just "Valor picks Quinn up and goofily flies around faster and then does a lil' damage". The old one felt kind of epic, Valor swooping in and pecking the shiet out of enemies super fast.

But then people are saying Quinn is OP now?

idk. I just played her for the first time since coming back after a long break and I miss the old one.
